chooseEquipment.text: Click on the Random Table link to get money before continuing

message.text: You may take up to four of the following (both meals count as one object):
Drop the Backpack Items you want to give to the guards
Drop one Backpack Item before continuing

numberPicker.text: Choose the number for the Cloeasian combination lock

message.text: Drop a Weapon and a Special Item, if you have

numberPicker.text: Choose the number for location of the Tomb of the Majhan

message.text: WARNING: There is an error on the map. The city of Chula should have a flag.
